summary.name: SONY Playstation 5
summary.description: The PlayStation 5 is a video game console developed by SONY Interactive Entertainment. It was released in 2020 during the height of the COVID-19 pandemic, leading to a global shortage. The console features a predominantly white color scheme, with black accents and LED lighting. The console is available in two versions, a digital edition and a physical one; the physical edition includes a DVD drive. The cost of a PlayStation 5 ranges from $320-$450 in various retail stores such as Best Buy, GameStop, etc.

overview.name: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co
overview.description: Taiwan Semiconducter Manufacturing Co is presumed to be working with SONY or more specifically, Sony Semiconductor Solutions Corporation for the production of semiconducters used in the PlayStation 5. SONY has decided to invest $7 billion in developing a new chip factory in Japan, in tandem with Taiwan Semiconducter Manufacturing Co.

location.address: Southwestern Japan's Kumamoto Prefecture

overview.name: Playstation Headquarters
overview.description: The PlayStation headquarters are deeply involved in the creative/developmental process of the PlayStation 5. Although most actual production probably happened abroad in plants located in China, Taiwan, or even Japan the headquarters in California is the hub of decision-making within the company.

location.address: 2207 Bridgepointe Pkwy. San Mateo, CA 94404 USA

overview.name: Changsha South Tantalum Niobium Co., Ltd.
overview.description: Changsha South Tantalum Niobium Co. supplies SONY with atleast part of the tantalum used in the manufacturing process of the PlayStation 5 and other SONY electronics. The company specialized in "colored metals for research and development, manufacture, and sale of rare metal Tantalum." They occupy zones totaling over 3000 square meters.

location.address: Dagualing Village Huangxing Town, 410129, Changsha, Hunan, China

overview.name: Global Advanced Metals Japan K. K.
overview.description: Global Advanced Metals is a larger corporation with multiple locations across the world, specializing in the research and discovery of rare metals. This node refers to the Aizu plant in Japan, where an advanced team focuses on research of Tantalum. They supply SONY with Tantalum. The corporation also supplies AMD through both their Aizu location and their Boyertown office.

location.address: 111 Nagayachi, Higashi-Nagahara, Kawahigashi-machi, Aizuwakamatsu Fukushima 969-3431 Japan

overview.name: Global Advanced Metals USA, Inc.
overview.description: Global Advanced Metals is a larger corporation with multiple locations across the world, specializing in the research and discovery of rare metals. This node refers to the Boyertown plant. The company also supplies AMD through both their Aizu location and their Boyertown plant.

location.address: County Line Road P.O. Box 1608 Boyertown, PA 19512 USA

overview.name: Solikamsk Magnesium Works OAO
overview.description: Solikamsk magnesium works is a Russian company that specializes in the production of non-ferrous metals. The company distributes its productions both domestically and internationally, supplying SONY with Tantalum that is used in the manufacturing process of the PS5 or other SONY electronics.

location.address: Ul.Pravdy,9 SOLIKAMSK, 618541 Russian Federation

overview.name: Ulba Metallurgical Plant JSC
overview.description: Ulba Metallurgical Plant is a mining company that specializes in the production of non-ferrous metals. It is a subsidiary of the National Atomic Company "Kazatomprom" a main contender in the nuclear industry of Kazakhstan. They supply SONY and AMD with Tantalum.

location.address: 102, Abay Avenue, Ust-Kamenogorsk 070005, Republic of Kazakhstan

overview.name: Kazatomprom
overview.description: Kazatomprom is an atomic company with a monopoly over mineral reserves in Kazakhstan. Is is the parent company of Ulba Metallurgical Plant JSC.

location.address: 7/12 building, Syganak street, Z05T1X3, Nur-Sultan, Republic of Kazakhstan

overview.name: CV Serumpun Sebalai
overview.description: CV Serumpun Sebalai is one of many mining plants/factories located in Indonedia that supplies SONY with minerals. This location in particular supplies the corporation with tin used in the manufacturing process of the PlayStation 5 and/or other SONY electronics.

location.address: Jln.Polwan No.20 RT.16 RW.06 Kel.Dul Kec.Pangkalan Baru Bangka Tenagh Indonesia 306414

overview.name: Minsur
overview.description: Minsur is a larger mining corporation that specializes in the smelting and refining of tin. Their plant in the city of Pisco, Peru, specifically, supplies SONY entertainment with tin used in the manufacturing process of the PS5 and/or other SONY electronics. The corporation also supplies tin to AMD.

location.address: 238.5 km of the Pan-American Highway South â€“ Paracas, Pisco, Ica.

overview.name: Rui Da Hung
overview.description: Rui Da Hung is a "tin metal smeling and recycling company" that distributes tin to SONY used in the manufacturing process of the PS5 and/or other SONY electronics. The corporation also supplies tin to AMD.

location.address: No.1-1,Lane 139,Gong 5th Rd., Lin 39, Wulin Village, Longtan Shiang Taoyuang Taiwan

overview.name: Tuyen Quang Non-Ferrous Metals Joint Stock Company
overview.description: Tuyen Quang Non-Ferrous Metals Joint Stock Company is an industrial smelting corporation that supplies tin to SONY that is used in the manufacturing process of the PS5 and/or other SONY electronics.

They supply SONY with tungsten that is used in the manufacturing process of the PlayStation 5 and/or other SONY electronics. They also supply tungsten to AMD.

overview.description: Ganzhou Jiangwu Ferrotungsten Co. is one of the major producers of ferrotungsten, supplying SONY with the metal that is used in the manufacturing process of the PS5 and/or other SONY electronics. They also supply tungsten to AMD.

overview.description: This corporation, as a subsidiary of the Masan High-Tech Materials Group, specializes in the production of tungsten powders. Supplying SONY with tungsten used in the manufacturing process of the PS5 and/or other SONY electronics. A separate location under the same larger corporate entity also supplies tungsten to AMD.

location.address: Im Schleeke 78 â€“ 91 38642 Goslar Germany

overview.name: Hydrometallurg, JSC
overview.description: This node is a plant that specializes in the development of non-ferrous metals. It spans around 40 hectares, including 19 building facilities. The company supplies tungsteon to SONY used in the manufacturing process of the PS5 and/or other SONY electronics.

location.address: Nalchik, the Kabardino-Balkar Republic

overview.name: Kennametal Fallon
overview.description: Kennametal Fallon produces tungsten, and other metal-allow powders. They supply tungsten to SONY for the production of the PS5 and/or other SONY electronics. The corporation also supplies tungsten to AMD.

location.address: 347 N. Taylor St. Fallon, NV 89406 US

overview.name: Advanced Micro Devices Inc
overview.description: Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) is a leading semiconducter manufacturer that produces custom semiconducters used in the production of the PlayStation 5. SONY Interactive Entertainment is one of their largest consumers, accounting for a signficant portion of their revenue.

location.address: 2485 Augustine Dr Santa Clara, CA 95054

overview.name: Magnu's Minerais Metais e Ligas Ltd.
overview.description: Magnu's Minerais Metais e Ligas Ltd. is a metallurgical company that has been operating in the tin market since the 90s. They supply tin to AMD used in the production of various electronics possibly including the semiconducters that are sold to SONY for use in the production of the PS5. The corporation also directly supplies tin to SONY.

overview.name: TANIOBIS Japan Co., Ltd.
overview.description: "TANIOBIS is a member of JX Metals Corporation and converts metal ores and secondary materials into high-performance tantalum and niobium-based powders." The corporation supplies tin to AMD used in the production of various electronics, possibly including the semiconducters that are sold to SONY for use in the production of the PS5.

location.address: 14F, The Okura Prestige Tower 2-10-4 Toranomon, Minato-ku Tokyo 105-0001 Japan

overview.name: Foxconn headquarters
overview.description: Foxconn is one of the main manufacturers of the PS5, also known to have manufactured the preceding console generations (PS4, PS3, etc.). The corporation faces a lot of backlash for alleged malpractices, and unsafe working conditions but has closely worked with SONY for many years along with other major electronics developers such as Apple.

location.address: No.2, 2nd Donghuan Road, 10th Yousong Industrial District,Longhua,Baoan,Shenzhen City,Guangdong Province, China 518109

overview.name: Casetek Computer (Suzhou) Co., Ltd
overview.description: It can be reasonably assumed that Casatek Computer has manufactured the PS5 faceplates. The PS4 was made out of acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS), with an origin of the Casetek Computer factory in Suzhou engraved in it. Although there is no direct connection between this manufacturer and the PS5, the faceplates are created from the same ABS material. The company is also a subsidiary of Pegatron Corporation, a supposed manufacturer of the PS5 and other SONY electronics.

location.address: No. 233, Jinfeng Road, Hi-Tech Zone Suzhou, Jiangsu, 215129 China

overview.name: Pegatron Corporation
overview.description: Pegatron Corporation is a manufacturing partner of many major electronics companies including SONY, Apple, Microsoft, etc. The corporation has not been confirmed to be involved in the manufacturing of the PS5 but they were deeply involved in the manufacturing process of the PS4 Pro so it is a reasonable assumption. A subsidiary company, Casatek Computer has also been linked to the ABS faceplates found on the video game console.

location.address: 5F, NO.76, LIGONG ST., BEITOU DISTR TAIPEI CITY 112 TW
